snippet.title: Five Nights at Candy's Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
=== READ THE DESCRIPTION PLEASE ===
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
No company is without a rival.
Freddy Fazbear's New Pizzeria has closed for good.
And so, another restaurant is going to take its place in the world of entertainment.
What could go wrong?
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
I know I have been tough with my rules around copyright.

But YOU CAN OF COURSE PLAY THE GAME ON YOUR YOUTUBE CHANNEL, even if you don't credit me!
Of course you still can't tell people that you or somebody else owns/made the game.

And I guess it would be the best for your fans if you put a download link to the game
in the game-video's description. But you don't HAVE to...
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Advertisement Animation by Shoocharu:
https://www.youtube.com/user/shoocharu

Trailer Music: "Combine Machinery Hall" --- http://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/157122
By: vai90 --- http://vai90.newgrounds.com/

The official game page --- http://gamejolt.com/games/strategy-sim/five-nights-at-candy-s-official/70253/

My official Tumblr --- http://the-interdimensional-seeker.tumblr.com/
My official Twitter --- https://twitter.com/Emilmacko
My official Reddit --- http://www.reddit.com/user/Emilmacko/
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
